DOC.brief_summary: The investigators plan to compare epidurals versus wound catheters for effects on pain relief and recovery following open liver surgery.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Local Infiltration Versus Epidural Following Liver Resection 2
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing open hepatic resection for benign or malignant conditions. Patients with contraindication to either epidural or wound catheter techniques. Inability to give written, informed consent. Jaundice (Bilirubin > 100 Î¼mol/L) Liver resection combined with secondary surgical procedure.
